ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: All of the Joes in Sierra Gordo have been captured and imprisoned. Another squad of Joes mobilizes from the Pit to help rescue their comrades. Cobra Commander notes their departure and realizes the Pit is now manned by a skeleton crew, providing an opportune window for an assault.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:57:15. [CVDB433199] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:35:28. [Issue ID 1158665]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brian Shearer,James Brown (J. Brown),Larry Hama,S.L. Gallant
